warming,malfunction,disaster,failure","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1981128/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"matiasbravojara"},"dateCreated":"2017-10-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the worst movies I've seen in years","reviewBody":"I went to see Geostorm because it was the only movie playing on a night where I really wanted to go to the 4D-cinema. Since it was a disaster movie I figured it would go well with the big screen and the 4D-effects.

Right from start I felt that something was off. The dialogue and over all atmosphere felt tacky and the acting didn't seem genuine. This was only the beginning though.

Geostorm is filled with canned dialogue and clichés that will make you cringe. Most of the actors under perform and there's no real chemistry between the main actors.

During the whole movie you feel like you're watching a movie that you've already seen and the tropes used are so in-your-face that you almost feel provoked.

I was thinking about leaving several times during the movie but since I was with friends I decided to stay. During the climax of the movie several people in the audience were loudly mocking the movie and laughing at the absurdity of it all.

Everything about Geostorm was a disaster. It was very predictable and preachy and the director actually made you feel dumb throughout most of the movie. The only OK thing was the CGI but even that felt re-used and tired.

Nobody should watch this movie. It's utterly bad and should be avoided at any cost. I don't even want to think about how much money was spent on this garbage","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":98214,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Scanner Cop
Policajac skener
programme.desc:
Scanner Cop: Directed by Pierre David. With Daniel Quinn, Darlanne Fluegel, Richard Grove, Mark Rolston. Sam Staziak, a rookie cop with the Los Angeles Police Department, is also a 'scanner' (psionic). When a string of murders begins to decimate the police department, Sam faces sensory overload and possible insanity as he uses his powers to hunt the man responsible for the killings." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0111082/","name":"Scanner Cop","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE0MzM3NjY4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDY3NTc5._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Sci-Fi"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0703809/","name":"Daniel Quinn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0283311/","name":"Darlanne Fluegel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0343988/","name":"Richard Grove"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0203039/","name":"Pierre David"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0750815/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020540/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0117139/","name":"John Bryant"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000343/","name":"David Cronenberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0203039/","name":"Pierre David"}],"description":"Sam Staziak, a rookie cop with the Los Angeles Police Department, is also a 'scanner' (psionic). When a string of murders begins to decimate the police department, Sam faces sensory overload and possible insanity as he uses his power","keywords":"psychotronic film,female police officer deceased,police,police officer,female police officer","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0111082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"FieCrier"},"dateCreated":"2005-02-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"almost the end of a series that perhaps should have stuck to one film: Scanners (1981)","reviewBody":"Pretty disposable sequel of sorts to the Scanners series. I've only seen the first Scanners film, which I didn't think was one of Cronenberg's better ones.

Anyway, in this one a poor father and son are taking drugs to suppress their abilities as scanners, but have run out for lack of money. The father is going crazy, hallucinating, and becoming violent. The police arrive, and the father gets killed. The boy gets adopted by one of the cops.

Years later, the boy is now a cop and his father the Commander. Throughout the city, ordinary people are killing cops without provocation. They're seeing the cops as things they fear. The Commander hopes that his son would be willing to go off his medication to try to use his abilities as a scanner to find out what is going on.

There are a couple head explosions (something memorable from the first Scanners), but mostly the psychic powers are used here to read minds, or throw people through the air.

There's a Scanner Cop II, oddly also known as Scanners IV when it should seemingly be the fifth one, if this is the fourth. programme.title: Dead Heat
Dead Heat
programme.desc:
Dead Heat: Directed by Mark Goldblatt. With Treat Williams, Joe Piscopo, Lindsay Frost, Darren McGavin. A cop and his undead partner must chase down the diabolical villain who killed him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0094961/","name":"Dead Heat","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQ5YzVlMTQtMGM3OS00NjI2LTkzOGEtNjkwMGRlNGE1MDRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Horror"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001852/","name":"Treat Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0685472/","name":"Joe Piscopo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0296534/","name":"Lindsay Frost"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0325358/","name":"Mark Goldblatt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0064409/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0249612/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0085535/","name":"Terry Black"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Dead Heat","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi846242073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ1MWUxYmUtMGI1MC00ZDY2LWIzYzQtODM0Zjk5YjJiMDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ1MWUxYmUtMGI1MC00ZDY2LWIzYzQtODM0Zjk5YjJiMDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Dead Heat"},"datePublished":"1988-05-06","description":"A cop and his undead partner must chase down the diabolical villain who killed him.","keywords":"armed robbery,police partner,morgue,suicide,uzi","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0094961/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chrissoda100"},"dateCreated":"2001-11-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dumb, but great fun","reviewBody":"OK! Lets get one thing straight right now. If you're looking for a serious movie about cops v robbers a la Robert de Niro, Al Pacino or something similar this is not the place to come.

If on the other hand you want an action packed, leave your brain in the lobby, tongue in cheek zombie flick, with a side order of buddy-cops take on dastardly criminals thrown in then you aren't going to get much better than this.

Cops Mortis (Treat Williams) and Bigelow (Joe Piscopo) are on the trail of nutty old Vincent Price (unfortunately not given much screen time) bringing dead criminals back to life so they can carry out jewellery store robberies. Of course being dead already makes it a tad difficult for the police to kill them.

Mortis comes a cropper fairly early on, but worry not as he is soon resurrected with the regeneration machine found at the dodgy research company that they think might be connected with the crimes.

The only problem is Mortis now has only twelve hours to solve the case before he decomposes, so things move on at a fair old pace after this as the lads do battle with various zombies, and a Chinese butchers shop full of meat that comes back to life!

Great fun for fans of 'Braindead' or 'The Evil Dead' style horrors, and anyone else who wants a film that they don't have to take to seriously. Also stands up well to repeated viewing.

8/10 I say, but judging by some of the other IMBD reviews others wouldn't (boring gits!)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7091,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

To be devotedly attached to a sit-com. She has created a character in Mom that it's bloody irresistible. An awful mother that it's impossible not to love. That's only achievable if the actress playing her is a genius. Anna Faris playing her daughter is a total find for me. Wonderful and a perfect foil for Allison Janney who reminds me of some of my favorites from the past, Kay Kendall, Eve Arden, Mary Astor, Joyce Grenfell and at the same time, she's like nobody else. She had only one moment in Primary Colors but she's memorable and has an entrance in The Hours that took my breath away. I want to see her in a movie that showcases her extraordinary talents to the fullest. Is that too much to ask?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":29739,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dark Skies
Zamračenje
programme.desc:
Dark Skies: Directed by Scott Stewart. With Keri Russell, Josh Hamilton, Dakota Goyo, Kadan Rockett. As the Barrett family's peaceful suburban life is rocked by an escalating series of disturbing events, they come to learn that a terrifying and deadly force is after them, one which may have arrived from beyond the stars." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2387433/","name":"Dark Skies","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcxNDE1OTgyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTEyMzMxOQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Horror","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005392/","name":"Keri Russell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3967248/","name":"Jake Brennan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0357979/","name":"Josh Hamilton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0829820/","name":"Scott Stewart"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0172260/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323227/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0098315/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0829820/","name":"Scott Stewart"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1865656089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMjY3NzcxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDIxODU5OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMjY3NzcxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDIxODU5OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the Barret family's peaceful suburban life is rocked by an escalating series of disturbing events, they come to learn that a terrifying and deadly force is after them. "},"datePublished":"2013-02-22","description":"As the Barrett family's peaceful suburban life is rocked by an escalating series of disturbing events, they come to learn that a terrifying and deadly force is after them, one which may have arrived from beyond the stars.","keywords":"alien abduction,child's drawing,dead bird,job interview,shotgun","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2387433/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cinematic_aficionado"},"dateCreated":"2013-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Effective despite its flaws","reviewBody":"An interesting ride would pretty much sum up my experience of this film.

The director did a smart job in the beginning by introducing the subject slowly and gradually in the sense that although we knew something was not quite right with this suburban house, he did not rush to bombard us with any massive amounts of visuals or gory scenes thus leaving us both intrigued and in anticipation mode. That is a technique not commonly used and achieving that takes skill.

Following that, the story runs smoothly as our characters go from surprise, to shock, then disbelief and acceptance. Good choice of adult and children actors, in combination to the gradual built up made this an stimulating watch.

It was the climax that I found to be rather anticlimactic. Nothing innovative, or even new. Whilst it never ceased to be thrilling, let's be clear about that, somehow the overdoing of visuals and certain ambiguities concerning the unfolding of the final moments left me somewhat colder.

Still, it is a highly effective and watchable thriller."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":72090,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dead Heat
Dead Heat
programme.desc:
Dead Heat: Directed by Mark Goldblatt. With Treat Williams, Joe Piscopo, Lindsay Frost, Darren McGavin. A cop and his undead partner must chase down the diabolical villain who killed him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0094961/","name":"Dead Heat","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQ5YzVlMTQtMGM3OS00NjI2LTkzOGEtNjkwMGRlNGE1MDRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Horror"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001852/","name":"Treat Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0685472/","name":"Joe Piscopo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0296534/","name":"Lindsay Frost"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0325358/","name":"Mark Goldblatt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0064409/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0249612/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0085535/","name":"Terry Black"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Dead Heat","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi846242073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ1MWUxYmUtMGI1MC00ZDY2LWIzYzQtODM0Zjk5YjJiMDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ1MWUxYmUtMGI1MC00ZDY2LWIzYzQtODM0Zjk5YjJiMDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Dead Heat"},"datePublished":"1988-05-06","description":"A cop and his undead partner must chase down the diabolical villain who killed him.","keywords":"armed robbery,police partner,morgue,suicide,uzi","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0094961/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chrissoda100"},"dateCreated":"2001-11-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dumb, but great fun","reviewBody":"OK! Lets get one thing straight right now. If you're looking for a serious movie about cops v robbers a la Robert de Niro, Al Pacino or something similar this is not the place to come.

If on the other hand you want an action packed, leave your brain in the lobby, tongue in cheek zombie flick, with a side order of buddy-cops take on dastardly criminals thrown in then you aren't going to get much better than this.

Cops Mortis (Treat Williams) and Bigelow (Joe Piscopo) are on the trail of nutty old Vincent Price (unfortunately not given much screen time) bringing dead criminals back to life so they can carry out jewellery store robberies. Of course being dead already makes it a tad difficult for the police to kill them.

Mortis comes a cropper fairly early on, but worry not as he is soon resurrected with the regeneration machine found at the dodgy research company that they think might be connected with the crimes.

The only problem is Mortis now has only twelve hours to solve the case before he decomposes, so things move on at a fair old pace after this as the lads do battle with various zombies, and a Chinese butchers shop full of meat that comes back to life!

Great fun for fans of 'Braindead' or 'The Evil Dead' style horrors, and anyone else who wants a film that they don't have to take to seriously. Also stands up well to repeated viewing.

8/10 I say, but judging by some of the other IMBD reviews others wouldn't (boring gits!)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7091,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

A cop and his undead partner must chase down the diabolical villain who killed him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0094961/","name":"Dead Heat","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQ5YzVlMTQtMGM3OS00NjI2LTkzOGEtNjkwMGRlNGE1MDRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Horror"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001852/","name":"Treat Williams","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0685472/","name":"Joe Piscopo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0296534/","name":"Lindsay Frost"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0325358/","name":"Mark Goldblatt"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0064409/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0249612/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0085535/","name":"Terry Black"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Dead Heat","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi846242073","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ1MWUxYmUtMGI1MC00ZDY2LWIzYzQtODM0Zjk5YjJiMDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ1MWUxYmUtMGI1MC00ZDY2LWIzYzQtODM0Zjk5YjJiMDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Dead Heat","datePublished":"1988-05-06","description":"A cop and his undead partner must chase down the diabolical villain who killed him.","keywords":"armed robbery,police partner,morgue,suicide,uzi","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0094961/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"chrissoda100","dateCreated":"2001-11-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dumb, but great fun","reviewBody":"OK! Lets get one thing straight right now. If you're looking for a serious movie about cops v robbers a la Robert de Niro, Al Pacino or something similar this is not the place to come.

If on the other hand you want an action packed, leave your brain in the lobby, tongue in cheek zombie flick, with a side order of buddy-cops take on dastardly criminals thrown in then you aren't going to get much better than this.

Cops Mortis (Treat Williams) and Bigelow (Joe Piscopo) are on the trail of nutty old Vincent Price (unfortunately not given much screen time) bringing dead criminals back to life so they can carry out jewellery store robberies. Of course being dead already makes it a tad difficult for the police to kill them.

Mortis comes a cropper fairly early on, but worry not as he is soon resurrected with the regeneration machine found at the dodgy research company that they think might be connected with the crimes.

The only problem is Mortis now has only twelve hours to solve the case before he decomposes, so things move on at a fair old pace after this as the lads do battle with various zombies, and a Chinese butchers shop full of meat that comes back to life!

Great fun for fans of 'Braindead' or 'The Evil Dead' style horrors, and anyone else who wants a film that they don't have to take to seriously. Also stands up well to repeated viewing.

8/10 I say, but judging by some of the other IMBD reviews others wouldn't (boring gits!)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7091,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"duration":"PT1H26M"</script><metacontent="

To be devotedly attached to a sit-com. She has created a character in Mom that it's bloody irresistible. An awful mother that it's impossible not to love. That's only achievable if the actress playing her is a genius. Anna Faris playing her daughter is a total find for me. Wonderful and a perfect foil for Allison Janney who reminds me of some of my favorites from the past, Kay Kendall, Eve Arden, Mary Astor, Joyce Grenfell and at the same time, she's like nobody else. She had only one moment in Primary Colors but she's memorable and has an entrance in The Hours that took my breath away. I want to see her in a movie that showcases her extraordinary talents to the fullest. Is that too much to ask?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":29739,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2}}</script><metacontent="

wife,vampire,turk,tarantula","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0829150/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jakewade3187"},"dateCreated":"2015-02-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"A must watch for fans of Nickelback and other terrible things.","reviewBody":"Let me start by saying I could not care less about the Historical inaccuracies of this movie. The special effects of movies today have taken the place of imaginative writing. Understandably, the artists behind the visual effects used in modern fantasy are proud of their craft, and are right to be. Unfortunately it appears that certified pre-owned scripts are the new norm, and are the new source for inspiration in film (movie) makers. Pretty soon ninety minute CG explosions will top the Box Office. This movie is an example of the CG eye candy special effects BS that gets spewed at consumers from an endless open fire hydrant of useless uninspired crap. Another re-re-retelling of Dracula's backstory? Fine. Oh, another gritty look into the steampunkish past of Count Chocula? Whatever! Yet another terrible ass Underworld pre-se-prequel!? Let me just WASH MY MOUTH OUT WITH BUCKSHOT FIRST! The sad state of Hollywood can be blamed directly on us as movie watchers. Keep watching this canned crap, and they will keep canning it.\n\nI will gladly take Makeup FX and costumes with seams and zippers any day, just for a little imagination.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":183155,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: I dalje radimo non-stop
programme.desc: David Jason ponovo je trgovac Grenvile, koji je nasledio mali dućan od voljenog, ali škrtog ujaka Arkvrajta. Grenvile sada vodi dućan zajedno sa svojim veselim i zgodnim sinom Lirojem, koji se rodio... David Jason ponovo je trgovac Grenvile, koji je nasledio mali dućan od voljenog, ali škrtog ujaka Arkvrajta. Grenvile sada vodi dućan zajedno sa svojim veselim i zgodnim sinom Lirojem, koji se rodio iz kratkog ljubavnog susreta od pre dvadesetak godina. Grenvile je i dalje na usluzi zajednici na svoj neponovljivi način. Željan zarade, Grenvile smišlja razne nepromišljene planove za podsticanje kupaca da ostave što više novca, ali retko kad postiže očekivane rezultate. Liroju ne nedostaje ženske pažnje, a Grenvilovo udvaranje staroj ljubavi Mavis stalno ometa njena žestoko zaštitnička sestra Madž. Tu je i uvek prisutna Crna Udovica, koja je takođe bacila oko na Grenvila, čini se.

programme.title: Škorpija
programme.desc: Serija se temelji na istinitoj priči i prati genija Voltera O'Brajena (Elyes Gabel) i njegovog tima sjajnih čudesa koji se bore protiv složenih visokotehnoloških prijetnji modernog vremena. Tim čine:... Serija se temelji na istinitoj priči i prati genija Voltera O'Brajena (Elyes Gabel) i njegovog tima sjajnih čudesa koji se bore protiv složenih visokotehnoloških prijetnji modernog vremena. Tim čine: Tobi Kurtis (Eddie Kaye Thomas), fini bihevioralista; Hapi Kin (Jadyn Wong) vunderkind za mehaniku i Silvester Dod (Ari Stidham), odličan statističar. Iako se međusobno odlično razumiju, vanjski svijet je za njih zagonetka. Srećom, Pejdž Dinin (Katharine McPhee) ima mladog sina koji će ih "prevesti" u vanjski svijet. Svi pobjeđuju s ovim timom: svojom izuzetnom domišljatošću rješavaju nacionalne krize, pomažući sebi da se uklope u stvarni svijet.

programme.title: Heroji ponovo rođeni
programme.desc: Naučno-fantastična serija o sasvim običnim ljudima, sa veoma neobičnim sposobnostima. Ovo je serija o običnim ljudima sa neobičnim sposobnostima koji su okrivljeni da su odgovorni za razorni teroristički napad koji se dogodio godinu dana ranije. U ovom serijalu pojavljuje se potpuno nova vrsta heroja i njihovi putevi se ubrzo ukrštaju sa putevima starih heroja. Ponovo se nalaze u sudbonosnoj bici u kojoj je u pitanju budućnost čovečanstva.

programme.title: Sajnfeld
programme.desc: Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet... Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet Emija, tri Zlatna globusa i pregršt drugih nagrada, čiji je broj mali u odnosu na višemilionski auditorijum koji je svake nedelje sedeo pred televizijskih ekrana kako bi video šta to njemu večeras na tako smešan i komičan način, smeta. Džeri je komičar koji ima najboljeg prijatelja, bivšu devojku koja mu postaje najbolja prijateljica i komšiju koji mu postaje deo života. Itekako mu ide sa ženama, ali nijedna mu ne odgovara: ili ima veliki nos, ili je prelepa, ali ne baš pod svakim svetlom itd...ali vremenom mu sve to postaje dosadno i odluči da menja svoj život.

programme.title: Brooklyn 99
programme.desc: U epizodi koja se zbiva u stvarnome vremenu, ekipa mora naći hakera koji je upao u policijske servere. Rosa ima probleme u vezi. Hitchcock i Scully pokušavaju pripremiti savršene lazanje. Jake Peralta (Andy Samberg) talentirani je detektiv, zbog čega se nikad nije morao ubijati od posla i slijepo se držati pravila. Budući da je uhitio više zločinaca od kolega, tijekom karijere svi su ga držali kao kap vode na dlanu. Sve dok u postaju nije došao novi zapovjednik, kapetan Ray Holt (Andre Braugher). Kapetan Holt poštuje pravila i propise, koje su detektivi 99. postaje dugo zanemarivali. Jakeovi kolege vrsni su i sposobni detektivi, ali kronično im nedostaje reda i discipline. Međusobno se nadmeću, idu si na živce, tračaju i flertaju, ali u konačnici jedni druge štite. Detektivka Amy Santiago (Melissa Fumero), dežurna čistunka u postaji, oduševljena je novim vodstvom. Budući da je odrasla sa sedmoricom braće, voli se nadmetati u svakom smislu te riječi. Silno želi uhititi više zločinaca od Jakea i svjesna je koliko se mora potruditi da bi u tome uspjela. Holtov zamjenik, narednik Terry Jeffords (Terry Crews), stijena je od čovjeka, no povukao se u ured nakon što mu je žena rodila blizanke Cagney i Lacey, i to zbog silnoga straha da u suprotnome neće vidjeti kako mu kćeri odrastaju. U 99. postaji radi i detektiv Charles Boyle (Joe Lo Truglio), kojem je Jake idol. Charles je izrazito vrijedan - niti je genijalac niti je snažan, jednostavno se trudi više od drugih. Jako mu se sviđa bahata, opaka i seksi detektivka Rosa Diaz (Stephanie Beatriz), ali on kod nje nema ama baš nikakve šanse. A u policijske posle nos neprestano zabada ekscentrična i umišljena tajnica Gina Linetti (Chelsea Peretti).

programme.title: Monk Mali Pas
programme.desc: Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli. Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli.

programme.title: I dalje radimo non-stop
programme.desc: David Jason ponovo je trgovac Grenvile, koji je nasledio mali dućan od voljenog, ali škrtog ujaka Arkvrajta. Grenvile sada vodi dućan zajedno sa svojim veselim i zgodnim sinom Lirojem, koji se rodio... David Jason ponovo je trgovac Grenvile, koji je nasledio mali dućan od voljenog, ali škrtog ujaka Arkvrajta. Grenvile sada vodi dućan zajedno sa svojim veselim i zgodnim sinom Lirojem, koji se rodio iz kratkog ljubavnog susreta od pre dvadesetak godina. Grenvile je i dalje na usluzi zajednici na svoj neponovljivi način. Željan zarade, Grenvile smišlja razne nepromišljene planove za podsticanje kupaca da ostave što više novca, ali retko kad postiže očekivane rezultate. Liroju ne nedostaje ženske pažnje, a Grenvilovo udvaranje staroj ljubavi Mavis stalno ometa njena žestoko zaštitnička sestra Madž. Tu je i uvek prisutna Crna Udovica, koja je takođe bacila oko na Grenvila, čini se.

programme.title: Opasna igra
programme.desc: Radnja serije prati brilijantnu ali istovrmeno nemilosrdnu advokaticu Peti Hjuz, njenu štićenicu Elen Parsons i advokatsku kancelariju Hjuz u Njujorku. Upoznajte mladu, inteligentnu, ambicioznu i diplomiranu pravnicu, Elen Parsons (Rouz Birne) koja je postala štićenica Patricije Hivs (Glen Klouz), nemilosrdne advokatice s dugogodišnjim iskustvom, kojoj baš ništa ne predstavlja prepreku do dobijanja parnice. Peti je osoba kojoj ne sme ništa stati na put, jer ona će manipulacijom i dobrom, ali i opasnom strategijom doći do svog cilja.

programme.title: Brooklyn 99
programme.desc: U epizodi koja se zbiva u stvarnome vremenu, ekipa mora naći hakera koji je upao u policijske servere. Rosa ima probleme u vezi. Hitchcock i Scully pokušavaju pripremiti savršene lazanje. Jake Peralta (Andy Samberg) talentirani je detektiv, zbog čega se nikad nije morao ubijati od posla i slijepo se držati pravila. Budući da je uhitio više zločinaca od kolega, tijekom karijere svi su ga držali kao kap vode na dlanu. Sve dok u postaju nije došao novi zapovjednik, kapetan Ray Holt (Andre Braugher). Kapetan Holt poštuje pravila i propise, koje su detektivi 99. postaje dugo zanemarivali. Jakeovi kolege vrsni su i sposobni detektivi, ali kronično im nedostaje reda i discipline. Međusobno se nadmeću, idu si na živce, tračaju i flertaju, ali u konačnici jedni druge štite. Detektivka Amy Santiago (Melissa Fumero), dežurna čistunka u postaji, oduševljena je novim vodstvom. Budući da je odrasla sa sedmoricom braće, voli se nadmetati u svakom smislu te riječi. Silno želi uhititi više zločinaca od Jakea i svjesna je koliko se mora potruditi da bi u tome uspjela. Holtov zamjenik, narednik Terry Jeffords (Terry Crews), stijena je od čovjeka, no povukao se u ured nakon što mu je žena rodila blizanke Cagney i Lacey, i to zbog silnoga straha da u suprotnome neće vidjeti kako mu kćeri odrastaju. U 99. postaji radi i detektiv Charles Boyle (Joe Lo Truglio), kojem je Jake idol. Charles je izrazito vrijedan - niti je genijalac niti je snažan, jednostavno se trudi više od drugih. Jako mu se sviđa bahata, opaka i seksi detektivka Rosa Diaz (Stephanie Beatriz), ali on kod nje nema ama baš nikakve šanse. A u policijske posle nos neprestano zabada ekscentrična i umišljena tajnica Gina Linetti (Chelsea Peretti).

programme.title: Monk Mali Pas
programme.desc: Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli. Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli.

programme.title: I dalje radimo non-stop
programme.desc: David Jason ponovo je trgovac Grenvile, koji je nasledio mali dućan od voljenog, ali škrtog ujaka Arkvrajta. Grenvile sada vodi dućan zajedno sa svojim veselim i zgodnim sinom Lirojem, koji se rodio... David Jason ponovo je trgovac Grenvile, koji je nasledio mali dućan od voljenog, ali škrtog ujaka Arkvrajta. Grenvile sada vodi dućan zajedno sa svojim veselim i zgodnim sinom Lirojem, koji se rodio iz kratkog ljubavnog susreta od pre dvadesetak godina. Grenvile je i dalje na usluzi zajednici na svoj neponovljivi način. Željan zarade, Grenvile smišlja razne nepromišljene planove za podsticanje kupaca da ostave što više novca, ali retko kad postiže očekivane rezultate. Liroju ne nedostaje ženske pažnje, a Grenvilovo udvaranje staroj ljubavi Mavis stalno ometa njena žestoko zaštitnička sestra Madž. Tu je i uvek prisutna Crna Udovica, koja je takođe bacila oko na Grenvila, čini se.

programme.title: Škorpija
programme.desc: Serija se temelji na istinitoj priči i prati genija Voltera O'Brajena (Elyes Gabel) i njegovog tima sjajnih čudesa koji se bore protiv složenih visokotehnoloških prijetnji modernog vremena. Tim čine:... Serija se temelji na istinitoj priči i prati genija Voltera O'Brajena (Elyes Gabel) i njegovog tima sjajnih čudesa koji se bore protiv složenih visokotehnoloških prijetnji modernog vremena. Tim čine: Tobi Kurtis (Eddie Kaye Thomas), fini bihevioralista; Hapi Kin (Jadyn Wong) vunderkind za mehaniku i Silvester Dod (Ari Stidham), odličan statističar. Iako se međusobno odlično razumiju, vanjski svijet je za njih zagonetka. Srećom, Pejdž Dinin (Katharine McPhee) ima mladog sina koji će ih "prevesti" u vanjski svijet. Svi pobjeđuju s ovim timom: svojom izuzetnom domišljatošću rješavaju nacionalne krize, pomažući sebi da se uklope u stvarni svijet.

programme.title: Sajnfeld
programme.desc: Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet... Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet Emija, tri Zlatna globusa i pregršt drugih nagrada, čiji je broj mali u odnosu na višemilionski auditorijum koji je svake nedelje sedeo pred televizijskih ekrana kako bi video šta to njemu večeras na tako smešan i komičan način, smeta. Džeri je komičar koji ima najboljeg prijatelja, bivšu devojku koja mu postaje najbolja prijateljica i komšiju koji mu postaje deo života. Itekako mu ide sa ženama, ali nijedna mu ne odgovara: ili ima veliki nos, ili je prelepa, ali ne baš pod svakim svetlom itd...ali vremenom mu sve to postaje dosadno i odluči da menja svoj život.

credits.actor: Denis Leary, Michael Lombardi, Steven Pasquale, Andrea Roth, John Scurti, Daniel Sunjata, Callie Thorne, Natalie Distler

programme.title: Brooklyn 99
programme.desc: Zakon i nered. U njujorškoj policijskoj postaji u Brooklynu svaki dan je poseban, svaki je drugačiji i u pravilu prilično kaotičan. Jake Peralta (Andy Samberg) talentirani je detektiv, zbog čega se nikad nije morao ubijati od posla i slijepo se držati pravila. Budući da je uhitio više zločinaca od kolega, tijekom karijere svi su ga držali kao kap vode na dlanu. Sve dok u postaju nije došao novi zapovjednik, kapetan Ray Holt (Andre Braugher). Kapetan Holt poštuje pravila i propise, koje su detektivi 99. postaje dugo zanemarivali. Jakeovi kolege vrsni su i sposobni detektivi, ali kronično im nedostaje reda i discipline. Međusobno se nadmeću, idu si na živce, tračaju i flertaju, ali u konačnici jedni druge štite. Detektivka Amy Santiago (Melissa Fumero), dežurna čistunka u postaji, oduševljena je novim vodstvom. Budući da je odrasla sa sedmoricom braće, voli se nadmetati u svakom smislu te riječi. Silno želi uhititi više zločinaca od Jakea i svjesna je koliko se mora potruditi da bi u tome uspjela. Holtov zamjenik, narednik Terry Jeffords (Terry Crews), stijena je od čovjeka, no povukao se u ured nakon što mu je žena rodila blizanke Cagney i Lacey, i to zbog silnoga straha da u suprotnome neće vidjeti kako mu kćeri odrastaju. U 99. postaji radi i detektiv Charles Boyle (Joe Lo Truglio), kojem je Jake idol. Charles je izrazito vrijedan - niti je genijalac niti je snažan, jednostavno se trudi više od drugih. Jako mu se sviđa bahata, opaka i seksi detektivka Rosa Diaz (Stephanie Beatriz), ali on kod nje nema ama baš nikakve šanse. A u policijske posle nos neprestano zabada ekscentrična i umišljena tajnica Gina Linetti (Chelsea Peretti).

programme.title: I dalje radimo non-stop
programme.desc: David Jason ponovo je trgovac Grenvile, koji je nasledio mali dućan od voljenog, ali škrtog ujaka Arkvrajta. Grenvile sada vodi dućan zajedno sa svojim veselim i zgodnim sinom Lirojem, koji se rodio... David Jason ponovo je trgovac Grenvile, koji je nasledio mali dućan od voljenog, ali škrtog ujaka Arkvrajta. Grenvile sada vodi dućan zajedno sa svojim veselim i zgodnim sinom Lirojem, koji se rodio iz kratkog ljubavnog susreta od pre dvadesetak godina. Grenvile je i dalje na usluzi zajednici na svoj neponovljivi način. Željan zarade, Grenvile smišlja razne nepromišljene planove za podsticanje kupaca da ostave što više novca, ali retko kad postiže očekivane rezultate. Liroju ne nedostaje ženske pažnje, a Grenvilovo udvaranje staroj ljubavi Mavis stalno ometa njena žestoko zaštitnička sestra Madž. Tu je i uvek prisutna Crna Udovica, koja je takođe bacila oko na Grenvila, čini se.

programme.title: Škorpija
programme.desc: Serija se temelji na istinitoj priči i prati genija Voltera O'Brajena (Elyes Gabel) i njegovog tima sjajnih čudesa koji se bore protiv složenih visokotehnoloških prijetnji modernog vremena. Tim čine:... Serija se temelji na istinitoj priči i prati genija Voltera O'Brajena (Elyes Gabel) i njegovog tima sjajnih čudesa koji se bore protiv složenih visokotehnoloških prijetnji modernog vremena. Tim čine: Tobi Kurtis (Eddie Kaye Thomas), fini bihevioralista; Hapi Kin (Jadyn Wong) vunderkind za mehaniku i Silvester Dod (Ari Stidham), odličan statističar. Iako se međusobno odlično razumiju, vanjski svijet je za njih zagonetka. Srećom, Pejdž Dinin (Katharine McPhee) ima mladog sina koji će ih "prevesti" u vanjski svijet. Svi pobjeđuju s ovim timom: svojom izuzetnom domišljatošću rješavaju nacionalne krize, pomažući sebi da se uklope u stvarni svijet.

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: Emmit Stussy, "kralj parkirališta Minnesote", zgodan je, samoostvareni mogul nekretnina sa savršenom porodicom, prava američka priča o uspjehu. Emmit Stussy, "kralj parkirališta Minnesote", zgodan je, samoostvareni mogul nekretnina sa savršenom porodicom, prava američka priča o uspjehu. Ray je više upozoravajuća priča. Umoran od života u Emmitovoj sjeni, Ray je proćelav, debeljuškast socijalni radnik koji je silno ogorčen kartama koje su mu podijeljene, a za to okrivljuje brata. Njihovo bratsko suparništvo vodi ih na krivi put koji počinje sitnim krađama, ali ubrzo dovodi do ubistava, mafijaša i surovog natjecateljskog bridža. Sitno suparništvo između dvojice braće eskalira i donosi haos maloj minesotskoj zajednici.

programme.title: Sajnfeld
programme.desc: Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet... Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet Emija, tri Zlatna globusa i pregršt drugih nagrada, čiji je broj mali u odnosu na višemilionski auditorijum koji je svake nedelje sedeo pred televizijskih ekrana kako bi video šta to njemu večeras na tako smešan i komičan način, smeta. Džeri je komičar koji ima najboljeg prijatelja, bivšu devojku koja mu postaje najbolja prijateljica i komšiju koji mu postaje deo života. Itekako mu ide sa ženama, ali nijedna mu ne odgovara: ili ima veliki nos, ili je prelepa, ali ne baš pod svakim svetlom itd...ali vremenom mu sve to postaje dosadno i odluči da menja svoj život.

credits.actor: Denis Leary, Michael Lombardi, Steven Pasquale, Andrea Roth, John Scurti, Daniel Sunjata, Callie Thorne, Natalie Distler

programme.title: Opasna igra
programme.desc: Radnja serije prati brilijantnu ali istovrmeno nemilosrdnu advokaticu Peti Hjuz, njenu štićenicu Elen Parsons i advokatsku kancelariju Hjuz u Njujorku. Upoznajte mladu, inteligentnu, ambicioznu i diplomiranu pravnicu, Elen Parsons (Rouz Birne) koja je postala štićenica Patricije Hivs (Glen Klouz), nemilosrdne advokatice s dugogodišnjim iskustvom, kojoj baš ništa ne predstavlja prepreku do dobijanja parnice. Peti je osoba kojoj ne sme ništa stati na put, jer ona će manipulacijom i dobrom, ali i opasnom strategijom doći do svog cilja.

programme.title: Brooklyn 99
programme.desc: Zakon i nered. U njujorškoj policijskoj postaji u Brooklynu svaki dan je poseban, svaki je drugačiji i u pravilu prilično kaotičan. Jake Peralta (Andy Samberg) talentirani je detektiv, zbog čega se nikad nije morao ubijati od posla i slijepo se držati pravila. Budući da je uhitio više zločinaca od kolega, tijekom karijere svi su ga držali kao kap vode na dlanu. Sve dok u postaju nije došao novi zapovjednik, kapetan Ray Holt (Andre Braugher). Kapetan Holt poštuje pravila i propise, koje su detektivi 99. postaje dugo zanemarivali. Jakeovi kolege vrsni su i sposobni detektivi, ali kronično im nedostaje reda i discipline. Međusobno se nadmeću, idu si na živce, tračaju i flertaju, ali u konačnici jedni druge štite. Detektivka Amy Santiago (Melissa Fumero), dežurna čistunka u postaji, oduševljena je novim vodstvom. Budući da je odrasla sa sedmoricom braće, voli se nadmetati u svakom smislu te riječi. Silno želi uhititi više zločinaca od Jakea i svjesna je koliko se mora potruditi da bi u tome uspjela. Holtov zamjenik, narednik Terry Jeffords (Terry Crews), stijena je od čovjeka, no povukao se u ured nakon što mu je žena rodila blizanke Cagney i Lacey, i to zbog silnoga straha da u suprotnome neće vidjeti kako mu kćeri odrastaju. U 99. postaji radi i detektiv Charles Boyle (Joe Lo Truglio), kojem je Jake idol. Charles je izrazito vrijedan - niti je genijalac niti je snažan, jednostavno se trudi više od drugih. Jako mu se sviđa bahata, opaka i seksi detektivka Rosa Diaz (Stephanie Beatriz), ali on kod nje nema ama baš nikakve šanse. A u policijske posle nos neprestano zabada ekscentrična i umišljena tajnica Gina Linetti (Chelsea Peretti).

programme.title: Monk Mali Pas
programme.desc: Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli. Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli.

programme.desc: Created by Vince Gilligan. With Bryan Cranston, Aaron Paul, Anna Gunn, Betsy Brandt. A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

credits.actor: Bryan Cranston, Anna Gunn, Aaron Paul, Dean Norris, Betsy Brandt, RJ Mitte, Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks
